flawed_nl_solution:
Billy has already run 6 miles because 1 plus 1 plus 1 plus 1 plus 1 plus plus 1 equals 6
Tiffany has already run 12 miles because 2 plus 2 plus 2 plus 1/3 plus 1/3 plus 1/3 equals <<2+2+2+1/3+1/3+1/3=12>>12
Billy has to run 6 mile to tie Tiffany because 12 minus 6 equals 6.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 7, not 12. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
